snippet: Pakistan says Indian troops fired across the border, killing three, and India claimed Pakistani gunfire killed a woman in the latest outbreak of violence along the disputed border.
abstract: At least four civilians are killed and several more wounded when Indian and Pakistani security forces clash along defacto border in disputed Kashmir region.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan says Indian troops fired across the border, killing three, and India claimed Pakistani gunfire killed a woman in the latest outbreak of violence along the disputed border.

headline.main: Civilians Killed in Disputed Kashmir Region Between India and Pakistan
